name: Diner Dash (itch)
description:
Diner Dash: I Better get a Tip After This!

The goal is to successfully manage the front of the house of this diner by taking orders and delivering them to the correct tables before the customer get mad.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move Player

'E' To Interact with Tables

Created For CS381: Game Engine Architecture at the University of Nevada Reno Spring 2022

Created By: Nathan Evans, Austin Schrage, Ryan Rytel

Please leave comments and feedback below as its always greatly appreciated!

Contact me at nathanevans@nevada.unr.edu

NOTE: THIS IS NOT A COMPLETED PROJECT AND STILL IN ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT
